samples_configs.name: —реднее проведенное врем€ в игре
samples_configs.data_base_request: SELECT avg(f_end_stamp - f_start_stamp) FROM t_sessions_log WHERE f_player_id = %player_id% HAVING  avg(f_end_stamp - f_start_stamp) != 0

samples_configs.name: —редн€€ сумма ставок
samples_configs.data_base_request: select avg(val) from(SELECT sum(f_bet) as val FROM t_participation join t_game on t_game.f_id = f_game_id  WHERE f_player_id = %player_id% group by cast(f_started_stamp as date)) as avgr WHERE val != 0

samples_configs.name: —реднее число побед
samples_configs.data_base_request: SELECT avg(val) FROM (select sum(f_is_win)/count(f_is_win) as val from t_participation as p join t_game as g on p.f_game_id = g.f_id where p.f_player_id = %player_id% group by cast(f_started_stamp as date) ) as avgr WHERE val != 0
